Quote: A brand is a person's gut feeling about a product, service, or company. It's not what you say it is. It's what they say it is.
Author: Marty Neumeier | The Brand Gap

Quote: Become the number one or number two in your space. Can't be the number one or number two? Redefine your space or move to a different tribe.
Author: Marty Neumeier | The Brand Gap

Quote: Compassion is not a religious business, it is human business, it is not luxury, it is essential for our own peace and mental stability, it is essential for human survival
Author: Dalai Lama

Quote: Everybody has a plan until they get punched in the mouth.
Author: Mike Tyson

Quote: If you chase two rabbits, both will escape
Author: Anonymous

Quote: If you want to change your business, your country, your own life, be humble enough and open enough to listen to other points of view.
Author: Hernan Carranza | Chief Innovation Officer at Intercorp

Quote: Strategy is about making choices, trade-offs; it's about deliberately choosing to be different
Author: Michael Porter

Quote: The best leaders start with humility, believing they donâ€™t know all they need to know before they start making decisions.
Author: Jim Keane | Former President & CEO of Steelcase

Quote: The indiscriminate use of typefaces, geometric patterns, and "abstract" shapes (hand or computer-generated) is self-defeating when they function merely as a vehicle for self-expression.
Author: Paul Rand | Thoughts on Design

Quote: What is important is seldom urgent and what is urgent is seldom important
Author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

Quote: Without a facilitator, the Design Sprint is like an orchestra without a conductor, like a recipe for a complicated meal, without a chef to cook it
Author: Jonathan Courtney | The Workshopper Playbook

Quote: Whatever you are, be a good one
Author: Abraham Lincoln

Quote: If you would persuade, you must appeal to interest rather than intellect.
Author: Benjamin Franklin
